title: following provisions of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Permits Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Permits Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited employment permit act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: following provisions of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024) shall
heading: 2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024) shall 
come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than section 3(1)(c); 

(b) Part 2, other than – 

(i) 

section 9(2)(j), 

(ii) Chapter 3, 

(iii) sections 12(2)(d) and 19(8)(c), 

(iv) section 23 in so far as it relates to seasonal employment 

permits, 

(v) 

sections 29, 30, 33(7), 36(4)(b)(iv) and 37(7), 

(vi) section 39(1) in so far as it relates to seasonal employment 

permits, and 

(vii) section 40(1)(i); 

(c) Parts 3 to 7; 

(d) Schedules 1 and 2. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 August, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [443] 3
